name: LaCrosseVirusDiseasesTestsForLaCrosseVirusAntibody
title: La Crosse Virus Diseases (Tests for La Crosse Virus Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of La Crosse Virus antibody.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: La Crosse Virus),(Exclusion Criteria: - panel tests
- All other Arboviral conditions not listed in Notes section)
